sandbox.setup.title: itch.io sandbox setup
sandbox.setup.windows.message: In order to run games in the itch.io sandbox, a one-time setup procedure needs to be run as Administrator.
sandbox.setup.windows.detail: After clicking 'Proceed', a permission prompt may pop up, asking you for your approval. This will add an `itch-player` user account to shield your games from the rest of your system.
sandbox.setup.linux.message: In order to run games in the itch.io sandbox, a setup script has to be run as root.
sandbox.setup.linux.detail: After clicking 'Proceed', a prompt will pop up, asking for your password. This is only needed when the sandbox is first used or updated, and your password is never remembered.
preferences.security.sandbox.title: Enable itch.io sandbox
preferences.security.sandbox.description: The itch.io sandbox will try to prevent games you download from doing harmful things or stealing sensitive data. While it's not a complete safety guarantee, running games in the itch.io sandbox is much safer.

prompt.dangerous_discard_download.detail: We'll restore {{title}} to the latest version the next time you try to use it.

prompt.clear_browsing_data.cookies_info: This will log you out from all websites you've logged into from the itch app.

prompt.logout_detail: In-progress downloads will be paused until you log in again.

send_feedback.title: Send feedback
send_feedback.describe_issue: Please describe what you were trying to do when the issue happened:
send_feedback.reminders.we_are_humans: Whatever you write will be read by humans.
send_feedback.reminders.be_precise: Be as precise as you can. We want to address the issue as much as you do!
send_feedback.reminders.include_reproduc: Include steps to reproduce the issue if you can.
send_feedback.reminders.mention_itchio_a: Mention your itch.io account name and/or the page that was giving you trouble, if relevant.
send_feedback.consent.please_review: Review the information below to make sure you're comfortable with it being sent:
send_feedback.consent.system_info_helps_: Having a rough idea of your setup often helps us identify the source of an issue.
send_feedback.consent.include_in_report: Include this information in the report
send_feedback.send.secret_url: A secret URL will be generated for your report.
send_feedback.send.secret_url.feature_li: From that page, you will be able to:
See everything we see about the report
Delete it if you decide to.
send_feedback.send.dont_send: Nevermind, take me out of here
send_feedback.final_thanks: Thank you for sending a report, it helps everyone!
send_feedback.success.view_report.delete: (You can delete it from this page)
send_feedback.success.promise: It will be reviewed as soon as we can, converted into an actionable issue, and hopefully fixed in a future release.
send_feedback.error.intro: Sorry, we could not send your report.
